text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulaş imon ovardaed, cun ʙixohed, ki ʙo pajomʙar (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) naçvo kuned (pinhonī suxan gūed), peş az naçvo kardanaton sadaqa ʙidihed ʙa hoçatmandon. In ʙaroi şumo az çihati savoʙ ʙehtar va ʙar dilhojaton pokizatar ast. Va agar ʙaroi sadaqa cize najofted ʙoke nest, pas hamono Alloh omūrzandavu mehruʙon ast
